about_the_game:
Welcome to the Backrooms!

Embark on an otherworldly adventure with our multiplayer co-op game, Backrooms. Immerse yourself in a liminal space that blurs the line between dream and reality, as you navigate through surreal levels filled with lurking entities and mysterious landscapes.

Liminal Journey Awaits

Step into a realm that feels like a dream, or perhaps a dream within a dream. Your bodycam, capturing the essence of a VHS tape, provides a unique and nostalgic visual experience, transporting you to a time and space that defy explanation.



Co-operative Exploration

Join forces with friends in the co-op multiplayer mode, where teamwork is essential for survival. Communicate through proximity voice chat to share your findings, strategize, and overcome the challenges that the backrooms throw your way.

Create Your Own Levels

Unleash your creativity with our built-in level editor, allowing you to craft your own nightmarish landscapes. Share your creations with the world, challenging others to face the horrors you've devised in the backrooms.



Proximity Voice Chat
Proximity voice chat isn't just a feature; it's a game-changer. Feel the tension rise as you huddle with your teammates, discussing tactics in hushed whispers that only they can hear. Adapt to the ever-changing circumstances, reacting to the environment and potential threats with real-time, spatialized audio that enhances the cooperative and competitive aspects of the game.



Escape the Unknown
Navigate through a variety of unique levels, each more perplexing than the last. Solve puzzles, uncover hidden secrets, and work together to find the exit. The backrooms are filled with mysteries waiting to be unraveled—will you and your team escape the unknown?



Key Features:

  • Multiplayer Co-op: Team up with friends for a shared experience in the surreal world of the backrooms.
  • VHS Style Visuals: View the dreamlike landscape through your bodycam, featuring nostalgic VHS aesthetics.
  • Proximity Voice Chat: Communicate with your team in real-time, adding a layer of immersion to your cooperative exploration.
  • Level Editor: Create and share your own levels, challenging others to brave the depths of your imagination.

Are you ready to face the unknown and unravel the mysteries of the backrooms? Grab your friends, gear up, and dive into an unforgettable multiplayer experience with Backrooms today!

Join Our Community!

name: Backrooms Media Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 750ti or higher with 2GB Memory
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 3GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050 or higher with 2GB Memory
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: The Backrooms is an Online Co-Op experience with friends, dynamic levels, and proximity voice chat. Every second week new level will be added! Or CREATE your own levels with the in-game level editor! Face the unknown together, communicating strategically in this immersive and chilling adventure.
